title: chore(ui): polish approval UI copy + accessibility tweaks (WIP)
head: feat/polish-approval-ui
body:
Summary:
- Improve microcopy and accessibility hints on the Design Approval presenter page (`presenter/design-approval.html`).

Changes made:
- Clarified header and instruction text
- Replaced button labels with clearer copy and added ARIA/title attributes
- Switched date field to `type=date` and added robust autofill
- Made toast messages accessible (`role=status`, `aria-live=polite`) and improved microcopy

Checklist:
- [x] Implement copy improvements
- [ ] Accessibility fixes (follow-up)
- [ ] Add tests & CI checks (follow-up)
- [ ] Add accessibility e2e checks to CI (follow-up)

How to test locally:
1. Start the server: `node runtime/triage_server/mcp_server.js` (or the usual dev start)
2. Open `http://localhost:8005/presenter/design-approval.html` and verify labels/ARIA and date input behavior.

Notes: This is a **work-in-progress (WIP)** PR â€” accessibility fixes and CI checks will be added in follow-up commits. Please review the copy and accessibility notes and suggest reviewers or assign one if you'd like.
